DOC.detailed_description: Background : The purpose double-masked , randomize , control clinical trial evaluate effect subgingival delivery boric acid gel adjunct scale root planing ( SRP ) clinical radiographic parameter compare method SRP plus placebo gel alone chronic periodontitis ( CP ) patient . Methods : Thirty nine systemically healthy patient CP include study . They divide two group : 1 ) SRP + 0.75 % Boric acid gel ( BA group ) ; 2 ) SRP + Placebo gel ( Placebo group ) . At baseline , 3 month , 6 month treatment , clinical measurement , include plaque index ( PI ) , modify sulcus bleed index ( mSBI ) , probe depth ( PD ) , clinical attachment level ( CAL ) radiographic parameter intrabony defect depth ( IBD ) , percentage change radiographic defect depth reduction ( DDR % ) assess .
DOC.criteria: Systemically healthy deep pocket ( PD ≥5mm CAL ≥4mm ) vertical bone loss ≥3 mm intraoral periapical radiograph Patients ≥20 teeth history periodontal therapy precede 6 month antibiotic therapy Patients systemic boron therapy Known suspect allergy boron supplementation Patients aggressive periodontitis Tobacco use form , smoker , alcoholic Immunocompromised systemically unhealthy patient Pregnant lactating female
